def typeText(someText):
    
    # program is to approximately 60 chars per line
    # and not split words
    chrcount = 0
    
    for l in range(len(someText)):
        
        sys.stdout.write(someText[l])
        
        chrcount +=1
        if(chrcount > 60 and someText[l] == " "):
            sys.stdout.write("\n")
            chrcount = 0
        
        
        time.sleep(.02)
        
        

def main():

    typeText(theText)
